title: How Much More Powerful is The Next Switch Model? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 08.25.20
description:
Thanks to Klarna. Download the Klarna app today to shop thousands of online stores and pay for anything in four easy, interest-free payments.

Go to http://boxofawesome.com and use code GAMES at checkout for 20% off your first box!

Andrea Rene returns for another episode to talk with Blessing about what the next Switch model could be.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:52 - Housekeeping
Gamescom Opening Night Live is happening THIS Thursday. You can catch us reacting to it live right here on Twitch.tv/KindaFunnyGames right after Thursday’s KFGD. It’ll be your regular reacts crew.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
The Roper Report   -
00:05:10 - We have even MORE details on that new Switch model - Takashi Mochizuki @ Bloomberg
00:16:40 - We have our verdict: Apple Doesn't Have to 'Immediately Reinstate' Fortnite on Its App Store - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:26:00 - There’s been a huge Call of Duty leak! - Emma Kent @ Eurogamer
00:34:40 - Ratchet and Clank is coming to Opening Night Live - Adam Bankhurst @ IGN
00:41:49 - Microsoft’s Big AAAA Studio makes some Big hires - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:47:00 - Out today
00:50:00 -  KLARNA
00:51:18 -  Bespoke Post
 Reader mail   -
00:54:45 - We need your own update. What's your review of the Popeye's chicken sandwich - Grayling T.
00:59:07 - Squad Up:Ben(PS4) - ThePunisher309
00:59:30 - Required Reading - The Sinking City pulled from stores amid legal dispute - James Batchelor @ GiBiz
01:01:04 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Tim & Whitta

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/

doesn't have to immediately reinstate fortnite on its app store this is from adam bankhurst at ign apple has taken an early victory in his legal battle with epic games as the court ruled it doesn't have to immediately reinstate fortnite on its app store as reported by bloomberg u.s district judge yvonne gonzalez roger rogers made the ruling late monday night but it wasn't a total loss for epic games as she also granted epic's request for a temporary restraining order blocking apple from limiting the game developers ability to provide unreal engine key graphics technology for other apps rogers was very clear in saying that the case isn't a slam dunk for either apple or epic games and that these temporary rulings will not dictate the final outcome of the litigation there will be another hearing on september 28th to discuss a longer-term solution this legal battle between apple and epic began when epic altered the price of fortnite v bucks and implemented a new direct payment system that
